page.title: 04Castlemorton Common-Leisure
page.content: An increasing number of local people and visitors use Castlemorton Common for a wide variety of leisure pursuits. These include kite-flying, ball games, radio controlled aircraft, jogging, orienteering, horse riding, landing sites for hang gliders and environmental studies of flora and fauna. The nearby mill pond in the Golden Valley is a popular fishing ground. It can be seen that this whole area provides an important facility for those who want to spend their leisure time in beautiful open countryside.
